sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div(class="form-todo form-group")
	p
		v-text-field(label="Nome", name="name", v-model="name")
	p
		v-select(:hint="`${select.type}, ${select.abbr}`", :items="['Manual', 'Eletrico']",item-text="type", item-value="abbr", label="Tipo", persistent-hint, return-object, single-line)
	p
		v-text-field(label="Pre√ßo", name="price", v-model="price", dense)
	p
		v-btn(class="ma-2", color="primary", dark, v-on:click="addTool")
			v-icon(left, dark) mdi-plus
			span Adicionar
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data () {
		return {
			name: '',
			type: '',
			price: '',
			items: [
          { type: 'Florida', abbr: 'FL' },
          { type: 'Georgia', abbr: 'GA' },
          { type: 'Nebraska', abbr: 'NE' },
          { type: 'California', abbr: 'CA' },
          { type: 'New York', abbr: 'NY' },
        ],
		}
	},

	methods: {
		addTool() {
			if(!this.name.trim() || !this.price.trim())
				return

			this.$emit('add-tool', {
				name : this.name,
				type: this.type,
				price: this.price,
			})

			this.name = ''
			this.type = ''
			this.price = ''
		},
	}
}
</script>
